name: Half-Life: History of Kumertau
storyline: Half-Life: History of Kumertau - The story of an employee who was sent to an ordinary town named Kumertau, but it was there that he was caught by the 7 hour war, but later, as it turned out, this small town harbors there are many secrets in itself, and the Сombine did not just choose it as one of the first points for enslavement, long before city17
summary: Half-Life: History of Kumertau is a work-in-progress singleplayer first-person shooter video game, based on a custom Half-Life 1 SDK known as PrimeXT SDK and running on Xash3D FWGS engine.
